description:
This application allows to manage Nitrokey 3 devices. Currently, it only allows updating the firmware of Nitrokey 3 devices. More features will be added in the future. To manage Nitrokey Pro and Nitrokey Storage devices, use the older Nitrokey App.


This bugfix release fixes a problem with the firmware update for Nitrokey 3 devices.
What's Changed
- metainfo: Add vcs-browser URL by @robin-nitrokey in #406
- ci: Fix runner for version-check job in cd-linux-arm64 by @robin-nitrokey in #407
- update: Specify model when connecting and release v2.5.1 by @robin-nitrokey in #409
Full Changelog: v2.5.0...v2.5.1
